page.title: 06SUPERNATURAL-FAWKHAM
page.content: The first place to visit is the Village public house The Rising Sun by the green and War Memorial.The building dating from l656 is beamed and quaint and full of interest connected with the Brands Hatch Racing Circuit.The "pub" was originally an Ale House adjoining a nunnery which seems to be a strange partnership!Parts of the building unused are said to be the remains of the nunnery and a pathway parallel to the village road to be walked by the ghost of a nun.In the attics of Pennis Farm is an old skull with the story of ill luck to anyone who removes it.A local legend of galloping horsemen, a phantom coach and a womsn's screams is connected to the murder of a nun at Pennis said to be a nunnery before the Restoration.
